verses.verse: <S%G1492><s%> But Seeing <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> He Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain; <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sat Down <S%G2523><s%> He, <S%G846><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth <S%G846><s%> He Taught <S%G1321><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Blessed Are <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Theirs <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Meek; <S%G4239><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Shall Inherit <S%G2816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Merciful; <S%G1655><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Shall Find Mercy. <S%G1653><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Heart; <S%G2588><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Shall See. <S%G3700><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Peacemakers; <S%G1518><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Shall Be Called. <S%G2564><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Persecuted <S%G1377><s%> On Account <S%G1752><s%> Of Righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Theirs <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exult, <S%G21><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Your Reward Is <S%G5216><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens; <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3779><s%> For Thus <S%G1063><s%> They Persecuted <S%G1377><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Who Were <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salt <S%G217><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth : <S%G1093><s%> <S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salt <S%G217><s%> Become Tasteless, <S%G3471><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall It Be Salted? <S%G233><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Nothing Has <S%G3762><s%> It Strength <S%G2480><s%> <S%G2089><s%> Any Longer, <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> To Be Cast <S%G906><s%> Out, <S%G1854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Trampled Upon <S%G2662><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Cannot <S%G1410><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> Be Hid <S%G2928><s%> On <S%G1883><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> Situated. <S%G2749><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Light <S%G2545><s%> A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Put <S%G5087><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corn Measure, <S%G3426><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lampstand; <S%G3087><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Shines <S%G2989><s%> For All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House. <S%G3614><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Let Shine <S%G2989><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5457><s%> Your Light <S%G5216><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> They May See <S%G1492><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Works, <S%G2041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Think Not <S%G3543><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Came <S%G2064><s%> To Abolish <S%G2647><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets : <S%G4396><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Came Not <S%G2064><s%> To Abolish, <S%G2647><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Fulfil. <S%G4137><s%>

<S%G281><s%> For Verily <S%G1063><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> Shall Pass Away <S%G3928><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Iota <S%G2503><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Tittle <S%G2762><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Pass Away <S%G3928><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Come To Pass. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall Break <S%G3089><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> Of These Commandments <S%G5130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Least, <S%G1646><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Teach <S%G1321><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Least <S%G1646><s%> Shall Be Called <S%G2564><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens; <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Practise <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Teach Them, <S%G1321><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Shall Be Called <S%G2564><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For I Say <S%G1063><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Shall Abound <S%G4052><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Above That <S%G4119><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Ye Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Ye Have Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Was Said <S%G4483><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Ancients, <S%G744><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Commit Murder; <S%G5407><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Commit Murder, <S%G5407><s%> Liable <S%G1777><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP That 3754 CONJ Every One 3956 A-NSM Who 3588 T-NSM Is Angry 3710 V-PPP-NSM 3588 T-DSM 80 N-DSM With His Brother 846 P-GSM Lightly 1500 ADV Liable 1777 A-NSM Shall Be 2071 V-FXI-3S To The 3588 T-DSF Judgment : 2920 N-DSF 3739 R-NSM ' 1161 CONJ But Whoever 302 PRT Shall Say 2036 V-2AAS-3S 3588 T-DSM 80 N-DSM To His Brother, 846 P-GSM Raca, 4469 ARAM Liable 1777 A-NSM Shall Be 2071 V-FXI-3S To The 3588 T-DSN Sanhedrim : 4892 N-DSN 3739 R-NSM ' 1161 CONJ But Whoever 302 PRT Shall Say, 2036 V-2AAS-3S Fool, 3474 A-VSM Liable 1777 A-NSM Shall Be 2071 V-FXI-3S To 1519 PREP The 3588 T-ASF Gehenna 1067 N-ASF 3588 T-GSN Of Fire. 4442 N-GSN

If <S%G1437><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Thou Shalt Offer <S%G4374><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1435><s%> Thy Gift <S%G4675><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar, <S%G2379><s%> And There <S%G2546><s%> Shalt Remember <S%G3415><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother <S%G4675><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%>

Leave <S%G863><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1435><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Altar, <S%G2379><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Go Away, <S%G5217><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Be Reconciled <S%G1259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To Thy Brother, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Offer <S%G4374><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1435><s%> Thy. <S%G4675><s%>

Be <S%G2468><s%> Agreeing <S%G2132><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G476><s%> With Thine Adverse Party <S%G4675><s%> <S%G5035><s%> Quickly, <S%G2193><s%> Whilst <S%G3755><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Deliver <S%G3860><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Adverse Party <S%G476><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Judge, <S%G2923><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judge <S%G2923><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Deliver <S%G3860><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Officer, <S%G5257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> Thou Be Cast. <S%G906><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shalt Thou Come Out <S%G1831><s%> Thence, <S%G1564><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> Thou Pay <S%G591><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Kodrantes. <S%G2835><s%>
Ye Have Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Was Said <S%G4483><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%>, Ancients, <S%G744><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Commit Adultery : <S%G3431><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP That 3754 CONJ Every One 3956 A-NSM That 3588 T-NSM Looks Upon 991 V-PAP-NSM A Woman 1135 N-ASF To 4314 PREP 3588 T-ASN Lust After 1937 V-AAN Her, 846 P-GSF Already 2235 ADV Has Committed Adultery With 3431 V-AAI-3S Her 846 P-ASF In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DSF Heart 2588 N-DSF His. 846 P-GSM

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Thine Eye, <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Right, <S%G1188><s%> Cause To Offend <S%G4624><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Pluck Out <S%G1807><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast It <S%G906><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Thee : <S%G4675><s%> <S%G4851><s%> For It Is Profitable <S%G1063><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Perish <S%G622><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3196><s%> Of Thy Members, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4983><s%> Thy Body <S%G4675><s%> Be Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Gehenna. <S%G1067><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> Ye Have Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Was Said <S%G4483><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Ancients, <S%G744><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Not Forswear Thyself, <S%G1964><s%> <S%G591><s%> But Thou Shalt Render <S%G1161><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3727><s%> Thine Oaths. <S%G4675><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS But 1161 CONJ Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You 5213 P-2DP Not 3361 PRT-N To Swear 3660 V-AAN At All, 3654 ADV Neither 3383 CONJ By 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DSM Heaven, 3772 N-DSM Because 3754 CONJ The Throne 2362 N-NSM It Is 2076 V-PXI-3S 3588 T-GSM Of God; 2316 N-GSM

Nor <S%G3383><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The Footstool <S%G5286><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Of His Feet : <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> By <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The City <S%G4172><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> King. <S%G935><s%>

Neither <S%G3383><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Thy Head <S%G4675><s%> Shalt Thou Swear, <S%G3660><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Art Not Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hair <S%G2359><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Black <S%G3189><s%> To Make. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You 5213 P-2DP Not 3361 PRT-N To Resist 436 V-2AAN 3588 T-DSM Evil; 4190 A-DSM ' But 235 CONJ Whosoever 3748 R-NSM Thee 4571 P-2AS Shall Strike 4474 V-FAI-3S On 1909 PREP 3588 T-ASF 1188 A-ASF Thy Right 4675 P-2GS Cheek, 4600 N-ASF Turn 4762 V-AAM-2S To Him 846 P-DSM Also 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-ASF Other; 243 A-ASF

And <S%G2532><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Who Would <S%G2309><s%> With Thee <S%G4671><s%> Go To Law <S%G2919><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5509><s%> Thy Tunic <S%G4675><s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> Yield <S%G863><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thy Cloak; <S%G2440><s%>
